channel.title: ScanX – Stocks
channel.description: ScanX stock market news (Full-Text RSS compatible)

item.title: Top News BHEL Announces Senior Management Appointment at Jagdishpur Facility 12 minutes ago Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited has appointed Shri Sunil Kumar Somani as General Manager and Head of Fabrication, Stamping & Insulator Plant at Jagdishpur facility effective December 15, 2025. Somani, a mechanical engineering graduate with 35 years of service since joining BHEL in February 1990, will report to Director (E, R&D). The appointment was disclosed under SEBI Regulation 30 requirements.
item.description: Top News BHEL Announces Senior Management Appointment at Jagdishpur Facility 12 minutes ago Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited has appointed Shri Sunil Kumar Somani as General Manager and Head of Fabrication, Stamping & Insulator Plant at Jagdishpur facility effective December 15, 2025. Somani, a mechanical engineering graduate with 35 years of service since joining BHEL in February 1990, will report to Director (E, R&D). The appointment was disclosed under SEBI Regulation 30 requirements.

item.title: Markets at Noon: Nifty and Sensex Show Slight Dip in Mid-Day Trading on December 15 2 hours ago Indian markets show a slight downward trend at midday, with Nifty 50 at 26,016.45 (-0.12%) and Sensex at 85,202.32 (-0.08%). InterGlobe Aviation faces potential regulatory action, while SEPC Limited announces a major coal mining project MOU. Market sentiment remains cautiously negative, with investors closely monitoring these developments.

InterGlobe Aviation faces potential regulatory action, while SEPC Limited announces a major coal mining project MOU. Market sentiment remains cautiously negative, with investors closely monitoring these developments.

item.title: Corona Remedies Makes Strong Market Debut with 38% Premium 4 hours ago Corona Remedies, a pharmaceutical company, listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at ₹1,470.00, marking a 38.42% premium over its IPO price of ₹1,062.00. The strong debut reflects positive investor sentiment towards the company and the pharmaceutical sector. This successful listing may boost confidence in upcoming IPOs, particularly in the healthcare space.
item.description: Corona Remedies Makes Strong Market Debut with 38% Premium 4 hours ago Corona Remedies, a pharmaceutical company, listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at ₹1,470.00, marking a 38.42% premium over its IPO price of ₹1,062.00. The strong debut reflects positive investor sentiment towards the company and the pharmaceutical sector. This successful listing may boost confidence in upcoming IPOs, particularly in the healthcare space.

item.title: HDFC Life Allots ₹7,490 Crore Debentures with 10-Year Maturity 1 hour ago HDFC Life Insurance Company has allotted subordinated debt instruments worth ₹7,490 crores through private placement. The company issued 74,900 unsecured, rated, listed, subordinated, redeemable, non-cumulative, non-convertible debentures with a face value of ₹1 lakh each. The debentures have a 10-year tenure, are rated AAA by ICRA and CARE, and will be redeemed at par value. Coupon payments will be made annually, subject to business day convention.
item.description: HDFC Life Allots ₹7,490 Crore Debentures with 10-Year Maturity 1 hour ago HDFC Life Insurance Company has allotted subordinated debt instruments worth ₹7,490 crores through private placement. The company issued 74,900 unsecured, rated, listed, subordinated, redeemable, non-cumulative, non-convertible debentures with a face value of ₹1 lakh each. The debentures have a 10-year tenure, are rated AAA by ICRA and CARE, and will be redeemed at par value. Coupon payments will be made annually, subject to business day convention.
